channel.description: Recent content in fediverse on Zexyen's Blog

item.title: Fediverse & You - A Primer on the new Hotness
item.description: A quick Primer So, Twitter has gone down the drain after a certain someone went and bought it and turned it into a trainwreck, and Facebook Meta has created a new App promising support with “ActivityPub”. Everyone seems to be moving at breakneck pace to new platforms and we’re left trying to figure out what’s what.
item.content:
A quick Primer

So, Twitter has gone down the drain after a certain someone went and bought it and turned it into a trainwreck, and Facebook Meta has created a new App promising support with “ActivityPub”. Everyone seems to be moving at breakneck pace to new platforms and we’re left trying to figure out what’s what.
